entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Blowing snow at times overnight. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Saturday 04 March 2023
